original_title: New England Hockey: Life at the Rink
overview: Documentary - Winters in New England are short, dark and cold; and for most, the one thing that keeps them going is a sport that has roots deeper than any other - hockey. This is the story of a close knit sport that is connected by family, tradition and passion. -  Tim Barry, Patrice Bergeron, Jean Brouillette
title: New England Hockey: Life at the Rink
